name: All Of Zhem
description:
All Of Zhem
A fast-paced action shooter game which you have to survive against real hordes of zombies in different scenarios. The gameplay features third person view and first person shooter.


Features
  • 3 unique maps locations and 2 playable characters
  • Hordes of zombies army that can run, jump and climb fast.
  • Slow-mo cinematic gun play actions
  • Hooking mechanics to plunge into the air
  • Difficulty settings can be adjusted for casual/ hardcore players

Coming Soon
